channel.title: +3 Possession, Trance Channeling, and Modernity on देवेषु विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +3 Possession, Trance Channeling, and Modernity on देवेषु विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: 01 NOTES
item.description: Brown 1997. Nor does it resemble the trance states experienced by contemporary charismatic or Pentacostal groups. These states have vague resonances with the possession found at Jejuri and other mass possession sites. However, I cannot consider them here. For an account of this festival as it occurs in Penang, see Collins 1997, whose theoretical perspective is quite different from that of others, and well worth noting. See my discussion of this in Smith 2001a.
